element-citation.article-title: Physicochemical characterization of chitosan nanoparticles and nanocapsules incorporated with lime essential oil and their antibacterial activity against food-borne pathogens

ref.mixed-citation: Sotelo-Boyas M, Correa-Pacheco Z, Bautista-Baños S, Corona-Rangel ML. Technol. (Lebensmittel-Wissenschaft - Technol.) 77: 15-20 (2017b). DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.lwt.2016.11.022
